code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{startCapture,stopCapture}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ControlPanel(){const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleStart=async()=>{try{const data=await startCapture();setMessage(data.message);}catch(err){console.error(err);setMessage("Failed to start capture.");}};const handleStop=async()=>{try{const data=await stopCapture();setMessage(data.message);}catch(err){console.error(err);setMessage("Failed to stop capture.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStart,children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStop,children:"Stop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message})]});}export default ControlPanel;
